Verses: 1 vellikku Vilaividam Undu, Ponnukkup Pudamidum Sthalamumundu.
2 irumbu Mannilirundhu Edukkappadum; Sembu Karkalil Urukki Edukkappadum.
3 manidhan Andhagaaraththilum Marana Irulilum Irukkira Karkalaik Kadaiyaandharamattum Aaraaindhu Thedi, Irulukkum Ange Mudivundaakkugiraan.
4 kadakkakkoodaadhadhum Nilaiyaadhadhumaana Aaru Ezhumbinaalum, Uzhaippaaliyaanavan Adhai Manusharaal Vatrippogappanni Sellugiraan.
5 boomiyinmel Aagaaram Vilaiyum; Adhin Keezhidangalilirukkiravaigalo, Akkiniyaal Maarinadhupolirukkum.
6 adhin Kallugalil Indhiraneelam Vilaiyum; Adhin Podiyil Pon Podigalum Undaayirukkum.
7 oru Vazhiyundu, Adhu Oru Patchikkum Theriyaadhu; Valloorin Kannum Adhaik Kandadhillai;
8 dhushtamirugangalin Kaal Adhil Padavillai; Singam Adhaik Kadandhadhillai.
9 avan Than Kaigalaik Karpaaraiyinmel Neetti, Malaigalai Verode Purattugiraan.
10 kanmalaigalukkullum Neerkkaalgalai Vettugiraan; Avan Kan Vilaiyuyarndha Ellaavatraiyum Kaanum.
11 oru Thuliyum Kasiyaadhapadi Aarugalai Adaikkiraan; Maraividaththilirukkiradhai Velichchaththile Konduvarugiraan.
12 aanaalum Gnaanam Kandedukkappaduvadhu Enge? Buththi Vilaigira Idam Edhu?
13 adhin Vilai Manushanukkuth Theriyaadhu; Adhu Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththile Adappadugiradhillai.
14 aazhamaanadhu: Adhu Ennidaththil Illaiyengiradhu; Samuththiramaanadhum, Adhu Ennidaththil Illaiyengiradhu.
15 adharku Eedaagath Thangaththaik Kodukkavum, Adharkuk Kirayamaaga Velliyai Nirukkavum Koodaadhu.
16 oppeerin Thangamum, Vilaiyerappetra Komedhagamum, Indhira Neelakkallum Adharku Eedalla.
17 ponnum Palingum Adharku Oppalla; Pasumponnaabaranangalukku Adhai Maatrakkoodaadhu.
18 pavalaththaiyum Spadigaththaiyum Aththode Oppittup Pesalaagaadhu; Muththukkalaippaarkkilum Gnaanaththin Vilai Uyarndhadhu.
19 eththiyoppiyaavin Pushparaagam Adharku Nigaralla; Pasumponnum Adharku Sariyalla.
20 ippadiyirukka, Gnaanam Engeyirundhu Varum; Buththi Thangum Idam Enge?
21 adhu Jeevanulla Sagalarudaiya Kangalukkum Oliththum, Aagaayaththupparavaigalukku Maraindhum Irukkiradhu.
22 naasamum Maranamum, Naangal Engal Kaadhugalinaalemaaththiram Adhin Keerththiyaik Kettom Engiradhu.
23 dhevano Adhin Vazhiyai Arivaar, Adhin Sthaanam Avarukke Theriyum.
24 avar Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalaip Paarththu, Vaanangalinkeezh Irukkiradhaiyellaam Kaangiraar.
25 avar Kaatrukku Adhin Niraiyai Niyamiththu, Jalaththukku Adhin Alavaip Pramaaniththu,
26 mazhaikkuth Thittaththaiyum, Idimuzhakkaththode Koodiya Minnalukku Vazhiyaiyum Erpaduththugiraar.
27 avar Adhaip Paarththuk Kanakkittaar; Adhai Aaraaindhu Aayaththappaduththi,
28 manushanai Nokki: Idho, Aandavarukku Bayappaduvadhe Gnaanam; Pollaappai Vittu Vilaguvadhe Buththi Endraar Endru Sonnaan.
